body:
Satori is an elegant and clean color scheme for Vim, both for white or black
background terminals. This color scheme has been developed under
Terminall.app on Mac OS X but it also looks great in Linux too.

Install details:

Download satori.vim

    $ mkdir -p ~/.vim/colors/
    $ cp satori.vim ~/.vim/colors/

Edit `.vimrc` and insert "colorscheme satori". Here is an example:

    syntax on
    colorscheme satori
    set autoindent
    set hlsearch
name: satori
tagline: Satori is an elegant and clean color scheme for Vim.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
